name: Zog's Hopeless Abyss
description:
You've been captured by Zog the Cruel, an especially ruthless Beholder. He enjoys torturing his victims, and you're no exception. You'll need to think fast--and run faster--if you want to make it out of Zog's Hopeless Abyss.

Watch out! Everything is not what it seems. If you want to make it out alive, you'll need to avoid Zog's traps, and his merciless taunting.  

This game was created for Ludum Dare 47 over the course of three days. 
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/zogs-hopeless-abyss

PC Controls:
Esc - Pause Game
WASD/Arrow Keys - Move Character
Left Click - Interact
Spacebar - Jump
C - Crouch
Left Shift - Sprint
